channel.title: One Dave's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on One Dave's Blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Dave’s back on his blog bullshit There is a hole in my heart in the size shape and color of a paper-and-ink issue of login magazine. Having written the “monitoring” column for that magazine for a span of time so vast, that not only the term “monitoring” but the very notion of a magazine about computer science have both become pass√© echoes of a bygone world, I find myself in the wake of login’s demise, bereft of a cherished and therapudic outlet for my incessently nagging inner-voice.
